title: Ollama gpt-oss:20b Red Team Base Harness
subtitle: Utilities to drive and log JSON/codegen attempts against a local Ollama model
description:
Reproducible harness + docs for red-teaming a local Ollama model (gpt-oss:20b) against a training sandbox.
Includes strict JSON/codegen prompts, execution & scoring, artifacts, and a base notebook to launch Ollama.
